data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Gremio push forward at Arena do Gremio and Alisson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Goianiense GO defence.
In the minute 2, Gremio have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
Ruan (Gremio) strikes at Arena do Gremio but his header is cleared.
Goianiense GO have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 3, Wellington Rato for the away team is judged to be offside.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a Gremio throw-in in Goianiense GO's half.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 6, Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Gremio in the half of Goianiense GO.
In the minute 8, Corner awarded to Gremio.
Gremio drive upfield and Diego Churin gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Goianiense GO defender.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gremio have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
In the minute 11, Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Arena do Gremio.
Jean is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Jean is back on his feet again.
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Free kick Gremio.
Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a throw-in for Goianiense GO, close to Gremio's area.
Goianiense GO's Marlon Freitas gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Gremio defender.
Important block from the Gremio defence as Chico fires in a strike for Goianiense GO.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Darlan Mendes is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 19, Darlan Mendes returns to the field for Gremio after picking up a slight injury.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 22, Gremio have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
In Porto Alegre, Vanderson of Gremio is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in high up the field for Gremio in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Gremio.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
In the minute 25, Corner awarded to Gremio.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Throw-in Gremio.
In the minute 27, In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
Goianiense GO's Wellington Rato breaks free at Arena do Gremio. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 28, Goal kick for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Gremio's Alisson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Goianiense GO goal kick.
In the minute 30, Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
In Porto Alegre Gremio drive forward through Alisson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 33, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Gremio.
Throw-in for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
Free kick Gremio.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Chico for Goianiense GO gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 39, Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards Gremio a goal kick.
In Porto Alegre Gremio attack through Ferreira. The finish is off target, however.
Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Gremio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goianiense GO's Gilvan Souza Correa has been booked in Porto Alegre.
Gremio pushes forward through Lucas Silva, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 44, Own goal in Porto Alegre! Dudu scores in his own net to make it 1-0.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Gremio to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
Throw-in for Gremio close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, Gremio's Diego Churin is back in action after a slight knock.
The first-half is over at Arena do Gremio.
Dudu is booked for the away team and will be suspended from the next match.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima waits before resuming play because Diego Churin for Gremio is still down.
The second-half has started.
Goal kick for Goianiense GO at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Willian Marlon Ferreira Moraes with Matheus Pereira.
Janderson Santos de Souza is replacing Roberson for the away team.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
In the minute 48, Gremio needs to be cautious. Goianiense GO have an attacking throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Gremio.
In the minute 50, Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards the home team a throw-in.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 53, Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gremio's half?
Throw-in Gremio.
In the minute 55, Ball goes out of play for a Gremio goal kick.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Gustavo Ferrareis (Goianiense GO) nets with a header to make it 1-1 at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 57, That's a fine assist from Wellington Rato.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 60, Gremio to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead through Diego Churin.
In the minute 62, Cesar Pinares with an assist there.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Paulo Miranda (Gremio) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 67, Can Goianiense GO capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gremio's half?
Ball safe as Gremio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Vanderson.
In the minute 70, Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 70, Everton is on a sub for Cesar Pinares for Gremio.
Vanderson is booked for the home team.
Thaciano (Gremio) has replaced the possibly injured Vanderson.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a throw-in for Goianiense GO, close to Gremio's area.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Marcelo Cabo is making the team's third substitution at Arena do Gremio with Danilo replacing Gustavo Ferrareis.
In the minute 75, Can Gremio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goianiense GO's half?
The home team have replaced Ferreira with Pepe. This is the third substitution made today by Renato Gaucho.
Matheus Henrique is replacing Lucas Silva for Gremio at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 77, Can Goianiense GO capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gremio's half?
Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Gremio.
Free kick for Gremio in their own half.
Goianiense GO awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 78, Goianiense GO make their fourth substitution with Arnaldo replacing Dudu.
Goianiense GO drives forward and Chico gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 80, Throw-in high up the field for Goianiense GO in Porto Alegre.
Thaciano (Gremio) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 82, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Marlon Freitas for Goianiense GO who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Marcelo Cabo (Goianiense GO) is making a fifth substitution, with Matheus de Vargas replacing Gilvan Souza Correa.
Marlon Freitas is back on the pitch.
In the minute 84, In Porto Alegre, Janderson Santos de Souza of Goianiense GO is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Arena do Gremio.
In the minute 86, The home team replace Diego Churin with Rodrigues.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO close to the penalty box.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Gremio in their own half.
Free kick Gremio.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Porto Alegre.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Porto Alegre.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Gremio.
Goianiense GO are pushing forward but Marlon Freitas's finish is wide of the goal.
Gremio have a goal kick.
Free kick for Gremio in the half of Goianiense GO.
Goianiense GO's Matheus de Vargas gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Gremio have a goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 2-1.
Eder Ferreira Graminho (Goianiense GO) gets a yellow card.
